name: Artis Arcana
description:
Within this dungeon crawler, you have no supplies outside of the small amount of magic you carry. If you can't defeat enemies you won't be making it out of the dungeon alive. Use the corpses of enemies to craft every item you need to keep yourself going. Currently there are over 40 slimes to kill, and two bosses to fight. Updates coming in the future!
